about.title: About
about.greeting: Hi! I'm Guilherme, a Fullstack Developer!
about.education1: Developer interested in management, development, and project optimization. High performance and fast learner, with experience in diverse areas such as Web Development (Fullstack), Mobile, Scripting, Cloud, Game Development, and acting in the educational field as a programming teacher.
about.education2: I've participated in hackathons and competitions, achieving 1st place at SuperGeeks Play for Family Hackathon (2019) and 1st place at Techers We code we change Hackathon (2022). I'm excited about the future and committed to applying my knowledge to contribute to projects that can positively impact people.
about.hobbies: Besides all that, in my free time I enjoy gaming and playing guitar.
